 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֹּ֫סֶר‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Isa.18.5|Isa 18:5]]</sup> ==unripe or sour grapes== collective (Late Hebrew ***id.***, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בּוּסְרָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (PS; syllable <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> uncertain [Nes, privately]; Polyglotts and Castell have <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhJgAdAIAAAP///wAAACH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAAmAB0AAAJghI+py+2PgoTUyVAfZnjrq1xeAkLidHijUWpAF6bh2pzzS2cpSvL6DwwKh8QiK2eM+JKL1k8luwFB1NyS08metlsK9wuudFnR49WCZB6H517a9MbFTTWnWm4vfu/8PrAAADs="> ***unripe dates***) — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֹּסֶר‎</span> [[Isa.18.5|Isa 18:5]] + 3 t. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּסְרוֺ‎</span> [[Job.15.33|Job 15:33]] — ***unripe grapes*** [[Isa.18.5|Isa 18:5]]; [[Job.15.33|Job 15:33]] ***sour g.*** [[Jer.31.29|Jer 31:29]]; [[Jer.31.30|Jer 31:30]]; [[Ezek.18.2|Ezek 18:2]].
